column4: Hi, what was the way to see what programs are using a particular mounted drive, if you want to umount and get the message that it's busy?
The  drive I'm trying to umount is a samba fs drive
errrm i know it's some thing like that
That's not the problem - I know what's mounted, I want to know what's using it.
Yes, that wasn't it though, as far as what I needed. Anyone? like a top to show what's using a particular drive? I ps au 'd it but nada
I think you don't understand my question
did you say yoy wanted to unmont some thing ?, look in /etc/fstab
